title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 212.2 - Conference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 212.2 - Conference

State Regulations

Prior to the hearing, a designated administrative law judge
shall conduct a conference on notice to all parties. The failure of a party to
appear at the conference may, in the discretion of the administrative law
judge, constitute grounds for dismissal of the absent party's pleading and a
default determination. Notes

212.2

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
